00014 #ifndef ULIB_RPC_ENVELOPE_H
00015 #define ULIB_RPC_ENVELOPE_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/container/vector.h>
00018 
00019 class URPCParser;
00020 class USOAPParser;
00021 
00022 class U_EXPORT URPCEnvelope {
00023 public:
00024 
00025         // Check for memory error
00026         U_MEMORY_TEST
00027 
00028         // Allocator e Deallocator
00029         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00030         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00031 
00032         // Costruttori
00033 
00034         URPCEnvelope()
00035                 {
00036                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, URPCEnvelope, "", 0)
00037                 }
00038 
00039         ~URPCEnvelope()
00040                 {
00041                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, URPCEnvelope)
00042                 }
00043 
00044         // SERVICES
00045 
00046    UString getNsName() const     { return nsName; }                     // return the name of namespace qualified element information
00047         UString getMethodName() const { return methodName; }            // return the name of the method the caller wants to execute
00048         bool isMustUnderstand() const { return mustUnderstand; }
00049 
00050         int                     getNumArgument() const            { return arg->size(); }
00051    UString              getArgument(int n) const          { return (*arg)[n]; }
00052    const char* getArgumentCStr(int n) const { return (*arg)[n].c_strdup(); }
00053 
00054 #ifdef DEBUG
00055         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 protected:
00059         UString nsName,                 // this contains the name of the namespace qualified element information
00060                           methodName;           // this contains the name of the method the caller wants to execute
00061         UVector<UString>* arg;  // this contains the argument for the method the caller wants to execute
00062         bool mustUnderstand;
00063 
00064 private:
00065         URPCEnvelope(const URPCEnvelope&)            {}
00066         URPCEnvelope& operator=(const URPCEnvelope&) { return *this; }
00067 
00068         friend class URPCParser;
00069         friend class USOAPParser;
00070 };
